title: INtravel
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Reminder: Your Amex Platinum’s $50 Saks credit expires in December — here are 8 Black Friday sale items to buy
items.description: This use-it-or-lose-it credit resets twice yearly, which means December is your last chance.

items.title: Airlines denied boarding to these 3 passengers. Could it happen to you?
items.description: Here's what happens when airlines deny passengers boarding on flights — and tips you can use to avoid the same fate.

items.title: Earn a $250 Amazon Gift Card instantly with the Prime Visa — just in time for Black Friday
items.description: Prime members can get a $250 Amazon gift card instantly with the Prime Visa, plus 5% on Amazon and Whole Foods purchases. Here's what you need to know...

items.title: Rove Miles Black Friday deals: Rack up transferable rewards on hotels, flights and more
items.description: Learn how you can rack up Rove miles on travel bookings and gifts this Black Friday, and what you can do with them.

items.title: Citi / AAdvantage Globe Mastercard vs. Strata Elite: Which is better for American Airlines enthusiasts?
items.description: Compare the benefits, earning rates, and pros and cons of the Citi Strata Elite and AAdvantage Globe Mastercard, two card options for American Airline...
